title: 2022-23 Utah Jazz Season Preview with James | Podcast

yaml.title: 2022-23 Utah Jazz Season Preview with James | Podcast
yaml.author: Adam Bushman

markdown.markdown:
The season is here! James and I get you ready as we count down the hours to Utah Jazz basketball once more. We dive into roster construction, rotation wrinkles, percolating storylines, and settle on some predictions.


Welcome to Jabber Jazz | Fan-driven, Ad-free content on Utah Jazz basketball

Adam Bushman [Twitter | @adam_bushman](https://www.twitter.com/adam_bushman)

Today:

*   Season Preview
    -   Getting you primed for various wrinkles of the NBA season

Guest:

*   James Hansen: @hansenjames
    -   Site Manager: SLC Dunk
    -   HoopsNerd YouTube Channel
    -   Pixel art aficionado 


Like what we're doing? Consider...

*   Subscribing
*   Following
*   Leaving a review or comment
*   Snagging some merch


## Season Preview with James

Topics:

*   Roster
    -   Any cut surprises?
        *   Context:
            -   Cut: Saben Lee, Stanley Johnson, Cody Zeller, Jared Butler
        *   Adam:
            -   Surprised no Dok
            -   Kessler > Dok so...
    -   What/who gets you excited?
        *   Adam:
            -   Kessler: immediate impact and high IQ
            -   Sexton: return to 75% of Don?
    -   First traded vet
        *   Adam:
            -   Jordan Clarkson: appears there's a market
    -   Any vets don't get traded?
        *   Adam:
            -   Mike Conley: the contract, no market, family situation
*   Lineups/rotations
    -   Favorite rotation wrinkle
        *   Adam:
            -   Kessler cemented as backup 5
    -   Least favorite rotation wrinkle
        *   Adam:
            -   No Agbaji? Why the heck not?
    -   Lineup you want to see
        *   Adam:
            -   Sexton-Agbaji-Fonteccio-Markkanen-Vanderbilt
    -   Collin off bench: how long?
        *   Adam: 
            -   By mid-November
*   Storylines
    -   Who are you curious on in draft?
        *   Adam: 
            -   Cam Whitmore: can he shoot? What's his style as a wing?
    -   Minnesota watch: thoughts?
        *   Adam:
            -   Be really good (23rd - 26th pick); 538 projects 19th pick
    -   Jazz approach to "winning"
        *   Adam: 
            -   by December they're looking to move the vets
*   Predictions
    -   Win projection/lottery odds ranking
        *   Adam: 
            -   23 - 59 record (4th best odds); ~tied with one other team, OKC/SAS worse
    -   MVP of the team
        *   Adam: 
            -   Lauri Markannen: looks pretty efficient right now
    -   ROY of the team
        *   Adam: 
            -   Walker Kessler: combo of opportunity and readiness
    -   Who disappoints?
        *   Adam: 
            -   Udoka Azubuike: we kept him and I don't anticipate anything
    -   Any Jazz all-stars?
        *   Adam:
            -   No...closest will be Lauri Markkanen

## Close

Thanks for listening!

Like what we're doing? Here's how you can support

*   Subscribe
    -   [Podcast](https://linktr.ee/jabberjazz)
